crazyballrun.game.controls.icontrols

Class KeyboardControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • crazyballrun.game.controls.icontrols.KeyboardControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IControl

    public class KeyboardControl
extends java.lang.Object
implements IControl
    Implementation of the IControl. The KeyboardControl offers a connection between keyboard-input and the game.
